Package cz.cuni.mff.java.projects.posapp.database

Class Database

java.lang.Object
cz.cuni.mff.java.projects.posapp.database.Database
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable
public class Database extends Object implements AutoCloseable
Singleton database connection and query component for the App

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static Database getInstance(DBClient client)
      Request the Database connection instance. Validates that the table definitions requested by the plugin client are present in the database. TODO: Singleton -> Factory and enable multiple database connections?
      Parameters:
      client - providing table definitions to validate
      Returns:
      the Singleton instance

    • verifyTable

      public void verifyTable(Map.Entry<String,DBTableDef> tableDefEntry)
      Modules requiring their unique tables will verify those tables exist in the database on startup using this method. A table definition is provided and the table is guaranteed to exist after calling this method. TODO: stop SQL injection
      Parameters:
      tableDefEntry - Entry [tableName: tableDef

    • query

      public ResultSet query(String query)
      Execute the provided query string on the database connection. TODO: Stop SQL injection?
      Parameters:
      query - to execute
      Returns:
      Result set or null if error or on UPDATE/INSERT.

    • doTransaction

      public ArrayList<ResultSet> doTransaction(Iterable<String> transactions)
      Execute the provided query string on the database connection. Treats query as a transaction and commits at the end.
      Parameters:
      transactions - to execute
      Returns:
      Result set or null if error or on UPDATE/INSERT.

    • prepareStatement

      public PreparedStatement prepareStatement(String statement) throws SQLException
      Prepare a statement in the database connection
      Parameters:
      statement - to prepare
      Returns:
      the PreparedStatement
      Throws:
      SQLException - on database connection failure
